idea:
In today’s world, millennials are credited for being the ones who are out to change the world. Right now, they are at the forefront of the food revolution. For starters, they prefer eating out or ordering in as compared to cooking at home, giving rise to fast-casual restaurant formats. The transformation is also noticeable when it comes to what they consume, and how they’d like to consume it. These millennial consumers prefer overloaded milkshakes, cheesy pizzas, decadent desserts, flavoured teas, desi Chinese and sinful waffles – all at their convenience.

And that’s exactly what we offer at QSR Brands India! It was set up with an aim to bring these millennial consumers the meals they love in formats that they find convenient. With a mix of various brands roofed under our cloud kitchens , our range of dining concepts offer quick treats for the always-on-the-go consumer.
name: QSR BRANDS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
